message.content:
Sure, here's a sample meal plan for you:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed berries and chia seeds
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and avocado
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli
Snack: Fresh fruit or raw veggies with hummus

Day 2:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with mixed vegetables (spinach, mushrooms, onions)
Lunch: Grilled shrimp skewers with mixed greens salad and balsamic vinaigrette
Dinner: Vegetable stir-fry with brown rice
Snack: Fresh fruit or raw veggies with hummus

Day 3:
Breakfast: Smoothie with mixed berries, banana, spinach, and coconut milk
Lunch: Grilled chicken wrap with mixed greens, tomatoes, and avocado
Dinner: Baked tofu with quinoa and steamed broccoli
Snack: Fresh fruit or raw veggies with hummus

Day 4:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with mixed berries and chia seeds
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and avocado
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli
Snack: Fresh fruit or raw veggies with hummus

Day 5:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with mixed vegetables (spinach, mushrooms, onions)
Lunch: Grilled shrimp skewers with mixed greens salad and balsamic vinaigrette
Dinner: Vegetable stir-fry with brown rice
Snack: Fresh fruit or raw veggies with hummus

Day 6:
Breakfast: Smoothie with mixed berries, banana, spinach, and coconut milk
Lunch: Grilled chicken wrap with mixed greens, tomatoes, and avocado
Dinner: Baked tofu with quinoa and steamed broccoli
Snack: Fresh fruit or raw veggies with hummus

Day 7:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with mixed berries and chia seeds
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and avocado
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli
Snack: Fresh fruit or raw veggies with hummus

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and adjust portion sizes as needed based on your individual calorie needs. Enjoy!
